flawed_nl_solution:
Jamie had two times more blue balls than red ones, so he had 2 blue/red * 16 red balls = <<2*16=32>>32 blue balls.
He lost 6 red balls so he had only 16 red balls - 6 red balls = <<16-6=13>>13 red balls
In total he had 32 blue balls + 13 red balls = <<32+13=45>>45 red and blue balls.
He bought 74 balls - 45 red and blue balls = <<74-45=29>>29 yellow balls.
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
